targets.expr: sum(((avg without(instance) (verify_config_certificate_expiry_date or verify_metadata_certificate_expiry) /1000 - time()) / 60 / 60 / 24) < bool 7)
sum(((avg without(instance) (verify_config_certificate_expiry_date or verify_metadata_certificate_expiry)/1000 - time()) / 60 / 60 / 24) > 7 < bool 14)
sum(((avg without(instance) (verify_config_certificate_expiry_date or verify_metadata_certificate_expiry)/1000 - time()) / 60 / 60 / 24) > 30 < bool 60)

avg (label_replace(verify_config_certificate_expiry_date or verify_metadata_certificate_expiry, "cn", "$1", "subject", ".*CN=([0-9A-Za-z_ ().-]+).*")) without(use, instance, subject, job, timestamp, key_name) - time()*1000

avg without (instance)(verify_saml_soap_proxy_msa_info
and on (instance, job)
verify_saml_soap_proxy_msa_health_status == 1)

targets.alias: SAML Soap Proxy Beat Exporter Task
SAML Soap Proxy Beat Exporter Task
